titles.title: To deem the vessel M/V MIST COVE to be less than 100 gross tons, as measured under chapter 145 of title 46, United States Code.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation Discharged.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 106-531.

calendar.text: Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 10.

action.text: Called up from the Private Calendar for consideration.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 3/9/2000--Introduced. Deems a named vessel (as long as its length does not exceed 157 feet) to be less than 100 gross tons, as measured under certain Federal law for purposes of applying an optional regulatory measurement.
